name: PocketDungeon (Fmlad)
description:
Welcome to Pocket Dungeon game made in 72 hours for MiniJam: Dungeons.

I hope you enjoy playing the game as it is and see the direction I was aiming for, with more time I think some interesting puzzles and combat could of come from this :)

Coding: Fmlad  
Art: Fmlad & Fiance
Animations: Fmlad 
Sfx: Freesound
